text: Gergei (Gerxèi) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,224 people lived there. Its area is 36.18 km². It is 374 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Gergei
